item.title: Roblox: Elemental Dungeons Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Elemental Dungeons is a very well-thought-out Roblox game with many dungeons to complete. In such games, freebies can be incredibly useful, as it can otherwise take time to farm the right amount of resources. Roblox players can use this article as a constant source of codes for Elemental Dungeons , which can be redeemed for free gems and EXP boosts.

Updated June 3, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: We have updated this guide and added two new codes. At the same time, we have checked all the old codes, and now you can be sure that they all still active. However, this can change at any time, so hurry.

All Elemental Dungeons Codes

The following codes offer rewards that will be useful for both beginners and professional gamers. It should also be added that the developers may deactivate the codes that are currently available, and they will no longer be able to provide rewards. Therefore, it is best to hurry up and redeem all active codes while still possible:

Codes Checked on June 3, 2024.

All Active Elemental Dungeons Codes (June 2024)

  • NUWUPDAIT - Enter this code to claim 350 Gems. (NEW)
  • FOLLOWER - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems. (NEW)
  • THISCODEISVERYSHORTHEHEEHE - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • CURSEDEVENT - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • CLOUDDUNGEON - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • EASTER2024 - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • SEASONONE - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • SORRYDELAYS2 - Enter this code to claim 200 Gems.
  • CALMDOWNTANGERINES - Enter this code to claim 35 Gems.
  • SORRY:( - Enter this code to claim 1 EXP Boost.
  • SubToToadBoiGaming - Enter this code to claim 30 Gems.
  • BETA - Enter this code to claim 60 Gems.
  • RefundSP - Enter this code to claim refund Skill Points.

All Expired Elemental Dungeons Codes (June 2024)

  • XMAS - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • UPD4 - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • SORRYDELAYS3 - Enter this code to claim 200 Gems.
  • 100MVISITSTHANKS - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • SORRYDELAYS:( - Enter this code to claim 50 Gems.
  • ATLANTIS212 - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • tyfor20kplayers - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • WERESOSORRYDELAYS2 - Enter this code to claim 400 Gems.
  • UNDERWORLD - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • TradingSoon - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • HALLOWEEN - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • frog - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • TYFOR50KPLAYERS851 - Enter this code to claim 100 Gems.
  • 10MVISITS - Enter this code to claim 30 Gems.
  • NEWCODE - Enter this code to claim 50 Gems.
  • BrokenGameMeSorry123 - Enter this code to claim various valuable gaming rewards.

How to Redeem Elemental Dungeons Codes

Although it is usually an easy and simple task that does not require many steps, it is still essential to know exactly how to do it. Therefore, for gamers who still do not know how to redeem codes in Elemental Dungeons , there is a detailed guide below:

  • First, players need to launch Elemental Dungeons .
  • After loading, fans will find a large blue Codes button in the game menu in the middle of the screen, and they should press it.
  • A menu will appear, and gamers should press another Codes button on the top right.
  • Next, players should scroll up and copy one of the codes provided above and paste it into the 'Type Code Here' field. Of course, the code can be entered using the keyboard, but copying is an easier option. Just make sure not to copy the code with a space accidentally.
  • And finally, to redeem the code and get a valuable game reward, players should press Redeem.

The reward will be automatically added, but keep in mind that each code can be used only once per account and only while it is active.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail Leak Gives New Details About Sunday's Model
item.description:
Highlights

  • Sunday, the leader of the Oak Family in Honkai: Star Rail, may soon join the playable roster with a darker-themed model.
  • As a powerful and dignified character, Sunday's true identity and intentions may surprise Trailblazers in upcoming updates.
  • While Sunday won't feature in Version 2.3, new characters Firefly and Jade are set to debut as five-star characters in the popular RPG.

A new Honkai: Star Rail leak has revealed more information about one of the upcoming characters, the leader of the Oak Family, known as Sunday. He has already made multiple in-game appearances, which led many players to wonder if and when he would become part of the playable roster.

Since its release in April 2023, Honkai: Star Rail has been introducing new characters to its playable roster with every update. The ongoing Version 2.2 has added two five-star characters: Robin in the first banner phase, and Boothill in the ongoing second part of the update.

At the moment, Sunday is an NPC who made his debut in Honkai: Star Rail Version 1.6. As the organizer of the Charmony Festival and the leader of the Oak Family, Sunday presents himself as a powerful and dignified character. However, the official storyline has been hinting that under this facade lies a cunning personality. Currently, Sunday is best known as Robin's older brother, and one of her voice lines confirms that he used to be her main protector. One of the most credible leakers in the Honkai: Star Rail community, who goes by the name hxg_diluc on X, has revealed more details about Sunday. According to the leaker, Sunday's official in-game model will feature a darker theme instead of the white attire he was introduced with.

The new leak could mean that Trailblazers will finally get to explore Sunday's true identity and intentions before he officially joins the live servers. Honkai: Star Rail 's recently introduced five-star Robin has also revealed that she and her brother have chosen different paths, and he was even featured as a boss fight in Version 2.2. Currently, there is no official information or credible leaks about Sunday's official release date.

Honkai: Star Rail - Sunday's Release Date

The only confirmed detail about Sunday's release is that he won't be featured on a banner in the upcoming Honkai: Star Rail Version 2.3, as HoYoverse has already announced the arrival of Firefly and Jade for this update. Firefly is expected to be featured in the first part of the update, which should drop around June 18, according to the game's usual update schedule.

Jade should be featured in the second banner phase, which could arrive around July 10. The official splash arts confirmed that both characters have a five-star rarity. So far, HoYoverse has not announced any new four-star characters for this update. According to recent beta leaks, Jade will be a new sub-DPS unit, while Firefly is expected to fill the main DPS role in most Honkai: Star Rail team compositions.

item.title: Starfield Fans Are Still Venting Their Disappointment With One Part of the Game
item.description:
Highlights

  • Starfield's Run the Red Mile quest fails to meet player expectations due to lackluster structure compared quests in earlier Bethesda titles like Skyrim.
  • Procedural generation in Starfield hinders blending storytelling and gameplay effectively in quests.
  • Shattered Space expansion in Starfield may address gameplay shortcomings and improve quest design choices.

Though Starfield has its fair share of awkward moments, many players still argue that the Red Mile is where the game completely fails to meet expectations. It's been nearly nine months since Starfield came out, and though the updates have fixed a majority of its technical issues, it may take longer still to address Starfield 's gameplay and narrative shortcomings. While Starfield had some standout quests, such as Entangled or Groundpounder, many of them had a structure that felt lackluster compared to earlier Bethesda titles such as Skyrim .

An argument could be made that the procedural generation in Starfield did not allow Bethesda to masterfully blend environmental storytelling and emergent gameplay with the quest itself, as most quests in Starfield tend to be self-contained fetch quests or elaborate, yet linear missions. Picking up a quest in Whiterun and choosing to make the trip to Winterhold can take players on an immersive journey in Skyrim that often takes a different shape in every playthrough, but Starfield has no such equivalent due to the disjointed nature of its locations.

However, the game sometimes brings out the potential of this format to craft a thrilling, tightly-paced narrative experience, with the Starfield quest Entangled being the most obvious example. By contrast, players such as Cybernetic_Virus believe Run the Red Mile to be Entangled's polar opposite, from an execution standpoint at least. Run the Red Mile is located in the Porrima system, and promises to set Starfield players up against a dangerous gauntlet that will test their combat skills to the limit. Unfortunately, the Red Mile itself is a rather leisurely stroll that lacks any sense of urgency, and players are greeted by a placid crowd awkwardly clapping for their success upon returning to the casino.

How Shattered Space Could Improve Starfield's Quests

Though Run the Red Mile is only a side quest in Starfield , what makes it so underwhelming is that Bethesda pulled off a much superior version of the same concept in Nuka World for Fallout 4 . In addition to First Contact, most players find Run the Red Mile to be one of the weakest quests in the game. However, if the new map in Starfield is any indication, Bethesda is very open to feedback on how to improve upon its latest sandbox. With Shattered Space releasing in late 2024, it could be the perfect opportunity for the developers to correct course on some of Starfield 's less-than-stellar design choices.

As for how Shattered Space might improve Starfield and its quests, there are two obvious directions. Bethesda could decide to lean into its biggest strengths, and design a handcrafted open world location that seamlessly connects missions in a new quest hub. Alternatively, it can embrace Starfield 's disconnected approach, and craft more unique mission types that focus on underutilized mechanics from the base game â€“ such as zero gravity combat or ship stealth. Though it remains to be seen what Bethesda will do with Shattered Space, Starfield 's modding community will no doubt attempt to fix the Red Mile once the Creation Kit launches.

item.title: Roblox: Evade Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Evade Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Evade
  • How to Play Evade
  • Best Roblox Horror Games Like Evade
  • About the Evade Developers

Dodging enemies and surviving as long as possible is what Evade is all about. This article will teach Roblox players how to redeem Evade codes to receive a wide variety of in-game goodies that will help give them an edge over the competition. However, Roblox players should be sure to do so as soon as possible, as it is unknown how long these codes are going to remain active.

Updated June 3, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This article has been updated to include all the new codes. Check back later, and we'll add more freebies in the next updates.

All Evade Codes

Roblox players looking to get some tokens, experience, and cosmetics to enhance their playtime can use the following Evade codes. They'll expire at random intervals, though, so be sure to redeem them as soon as they become available. As is the case in most other popular Roblox games, codes can only be redeemed once per account.

All Active Evade Codes (June 2024)

  • 222 - Redeem for 222 Tokens! (NEW)
  • 444 - Redeem for 444 Tokens!
  • therealdeal - Redeem for a free Bird Badge cosmetic!

All Expired Evade Codes (June 2024)

  • luckyday - Redeem for four clover pins!
  • NewYears2023 - Redeem for a New Year Cosmetic!
  • HolidayUpdateFix - Redeem for 2k Tokens!
  • HolidayUpdateFixEXP - Redeem for 300 XP!
  • 1bill - Redeem for a free 1B Celebration cosmetic!
  • Evade1K - Unknown Reward.

How to Redeem Codes in Evade

Redeeming codes in Evade is relatively straightforward, with players simply needing to follow a few steps. If a code doesn't work, they should make sure they entered it correctly and try again. If it still doesn't work after this, it could mean that the code has recently expired or has already been redeemed by the player.

  1. Launch Evade
  2. Press the Twitter icon located in the bottom left corner of the screen
  3. Paste the code into the text field
  4. Press Redeem to collect the rewards

How to Play Evade

Evade is a survival game. Players have to choose one of the many modes in the game. When the round starts, they have to constantly move and avoid various dangers. The game has very interesting physics mechanics, and knowing how to take advantage of this can be very important for survival. The player who can survive the longest wins.

Best Roblox Horror Games Like Evade

When a game gets boring, it's time to look for another one. This is a rather difficult task, since among many monotonous games it is necessary to look for a high-quality project. But, this is no longer a problem because in this article, players will find 5 high-quality games like Evade :

  • Color or Die
  • DOORS
  • ELMIRA
  • BEWILDERED
  • 3008

About the Evade Developers

The developers from Hexagon Development Community have been working on Evade for a long time and their efforts have not been in vain as the game has already collected more than 1 million likes. These developers also have another equally cool game - Tower Blitz .

item.title: Roblox: Flag Wars Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Flag Wars Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Roblox: Flag Wars
  • Flag Wars Tips and Tricks
  • Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Flag Wars
  • About the Flag Wars Developers

Capturing flags has always been a popular mechanic in games and the developers of Flag Wars have brought the tried and tested formula to Roblox in spectacular fashion. To spice things up a little, they also added quite a few weapons to the game that can be bought with in-game currency. For Roblox players who want to shoot their favorite weapon as quickly as possible, redeeming the latest Flag Wars codes can be a massive help.

Updated June 3, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: In this update, we added one new code and checked the old ones. To get more freebies, bookmark this guide and come back later.

Flag Wars Codes

Here is a list of all active and inactive codes for Flag Wars . Developers often add new codes, but hurry up and redeem active codes now because they may expire soon.

All Active Flag Wars Codes (June 2024)

  • 500MIL - Use this code for 50000 Eggs and $1000. (NEW)
  • SPRING - Use this code for 1000 Eggs.

All Expired Flag Wars Codes (June 2024)

  • TREASURE - Use this code for $8500 Cash.
  • COINS - Use this code for $1500 Cash.

  • FREETEC9 - Use this code for a free TEC9.

  • GINGERBREAD - Use this code for 12,000 Gingerbread and 500 Cash.
  • 80KCANDY - Use this code for 80,000 Candy.
  • FREEMP5 - Use for an MP5.
  • Candy4U - Use this code for 8,500 Candy.
  • FREEMP5 - Use this code for a free MP5.
  • FREESMG â€“ Use this code to get free gun.
  • FROST â€“ Use this code to get $500 and 4,500 snowflakes.
  • Snow4U â€“ Use this code to get $900 cash and 12,500 snowflakes.
  • THX4LIKES â€“ Use this code to get $1,200 cash.
  • TyFor30k â€“ Use this code to get $1250 cash and 19,500 snowflakes.
  • UPDATESOON â€“ Use this code to get $2500 cash.
  • XMAS â€“ Use this code to get 2,000 snowflakes.

How to Redeem Codes in Roblox: Flag Wars

Just like in most other Roblox games, redeeming codes in Flag Wars is a very simple task. Just follow the instructions below.

  • Open Roblox and launch Flag Wars .
  • Find the blue ticket-shaped icon on the main screen of the game.
  • Click on this icon.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Enter Code Here."

Flag Wars Tips and Tricks

Below, players will learn a few tips to help improve their gameplay:

Use Different Types of Weapons

Using different types of weapons depending on the situation can significantly increase the player's chances of survival. For example, if a player is out of ammo and the enemy is close enough, one should use a sword to avoid wasting time reloading, and a sniper rifle should be used when the enemy is far away.

Build Tunnels

Building bypass tunnels can increase a player's chances of getting the flag, so fans should try digging their own bypass tunnels and use bombs to make it faster.

Edit the Sensitivity Settings

In the game settings, players can change the sensitivity to make it easier for them to aim. The best way to get it right is to experiment.

Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Flag Wars

Shooters are incredibly popular on Roblox , and players always have a fairly large selection of games to try. Below they will find a list of the best Roblox games like Flag Wars . These games are also shooters, and they are very exciting to play, so those who are looking to try something a little different should consider checking them out.

  • Base Battles
  • Underground War 2.0
  • Military Tycoon
  • Ohio Codes
  • Da Hood

About the Flag Wars Developers

Flag Wars was created by the development team Scriptly Studios. They also have some other interesting projects that were popular before, but now, unfortunately, they have very few active players:

  • Moving Day
  • Road Trip
